content: *one crochet pattern three stylish ways to wear it meet the bernie scarf trio * not sure if you need a kerchief a scarf or a shawl why not all three the bernie scarf trio is three versatile patterns in one so you can choose the size and style that fits your vibe an ultra-soft wool/acrylic blend shows off the smooth stitching and gentle shaping making this accessory a cozy wearable staple for any wardrobe * view the free pattern on my blog 1 * **materials** * 45 230 or 340 yards of dk weight yarn sample uses lion brand wool-ease dk in lavender slate and goldenrod * 4 5mm crochet hook * scissors * tape measure * tapestry needle * locking stitch markers * wet blocking supplies **techniques** * basic crochet stitches * crocheting in turned row * working in row ends * wet blocking technique **measurements** -3 sizes available - kerchief 45 x 5 scarf 60 x 8 5 shawl 85 x 11 // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 https //tlycblog com/bernie-scarf-trio-a-free-crochet-skinny-scarf-pattern-in-three-sizes/
